comprehensive_overview: T-Coffee is a versatile multiple sequence alignment software tool that is widely used in bioinformatics. It provides a range of alignment methods and features for accurately aligning protein and nucleotide sequences.
core_features: T-Coffee offers various alignment algorithms such as progressive alignment, consistency-based alignment, and pattern-driven strategies. It supports the integration of external information sources for alignment refinement and consensus alignment generation. T-Coffee also includes tools for assessing alignment quality and visualizing the results.
